attributes.additional_details: This man has shown courage throughout his military career and at the age of 99 has proven what can be done in the face of adversity.
attributes.background: Award a knighthood to Captain Tom Moore for his outstanding contribution to the NHS

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
